author: sandygao
msg: Added a couple of comments, which I think should be changed in our default entity resolver.

author: sandygao
msg: For the grammar of schema namespace, we never need to add decls to the global hashtables other than the built-in types. So I initialized the size of all the other hashtables to 0. But it turned out that it would cause some exceptions in get() method. So I changed the size to 1.

author: sandygao
msg: After XSCMValidator.oneTransition, we should always report an error if the state is FIRST_ERROR.
Even in the case where a decl is returned.

author: sandygao
msg: Check whether tempAttrUse is null, to avoid NPE.

author: lmartin
msg: added additional subst. text for a few messages
